Digital pedagogy considerations

Nguyen, a dedicated class teacher for two years, faces the challenge of integrating technology into his bustling classroom of 38 eager 8- to 9-year-olds.

With a limited number of laptop computers at his disposal, he ponders over their potential to enhance social learning.

Each device is like a portal for two students, a shared window into a world of digital collaboration.

As Nguyen contemplates the best approach to foster meaningful connections through these screens, let's join him in exploring the various digital pedagogy considerations that can transform his classroom into a hub of interactive learning.
